title: User Registration with Membership Tier Assignment
description: Verify that a new user can register successfully and is assigned the correct membership tier based on input data.

steps.description: Navigate to registration page
Input valid user details including required membership information
Submit the registration form
Check registration success confirmation is displayed
Validate that the user's membership level is correctly assigned in the system

title: User Login with Membership Level Verification
description: Verify that a registered user can log in successfully and that the correct membership level is reflected in the user session.

steps.description: Navigate to login page
Input valid username and password for a registered user
Click the login button
Confirm login is successful and user dashboard or homepage is displayed
Verify that membership level data is accessible and correctly shown in user profile or UI elements

title: Tire Search with Valid Filters
description: Verify that searching tires with various valid filter combinations returns accurate and relevant product results from proxy API.

steps.description: Navigate to the tire search page
Apply filter: size (e.g., 205/55 R16)
Apply filter: brand (e.g., Michelin)
Apply filter: product type
Apply filter: inventory availability
Apply filter: DOT codes
Click search button
Verify API /api/shop is called with all filters applied
Check the displayed search results match the filter criteria

title: Search with No Matching Results
description: Verify the system behavior and UI when search filters yield no tire results.

steps.description: Navigate to tire search page
Input filter combination guaranteed to yield no results (e.g., nonexistent brand + size)
Execute search
Confirm API returns empty result set
Verify user is shown a meaningful 'no results found' message

title: Shopping Cart Comparison Feature - Add and Compare Tires
description: Verify users can add multiple tires to the comparison cart and view a side-by-side comparison correctly.

steps.description: Search tires and select multiple from the result list
Add selected tires to the comparison cart
Navigate to comparison cart page
Verify all added tires are listed correctly in the cart
Validate that side-by-side comparison details are shown for each tire attribute

title: Quote Generation Functionality
description: Verify the quote feature generates valid and actionable price quotes for selected tires.

steps.description: Select one or more tires from search results or comparison cart
Access quote generation feature
Submit quote request with required user details
Confirm that a quote confirmation message is displayed
Validate quote details are accurate and stored or retrievable by the user

title: Store Mode Activation and Consultation Display
description: Verify store personnel can activate store mode to provide live consultation and display available tires to customers correctly.

steps.description: Login as store personnel
Activate store mode from the control panel
Confirm store mode is enabled successfully
Verify that customers see the live consultation interface with correct tire inventory displayed

title: KakaoTalk Message Sending by Membership Level
description: Verify the system sends KakaoTalk messages targeted and tailored correctly according to user membership levels for marketing or support.

steps.description: Login as admin or system component responsible for messaging
Trigger KakaoTalk message sending targeted by membership tier
Verify messages are dispatched only to users with specified membership levels
Validate message content is appropriate for each membership tier
Confirm no unauthorized recipients receive the message

title: Inventory API Proxy /api/inventory Success and Data Validation
description: Verify that the inventory proxy API endpoint responds successfully and returns valid inventory data from blackcircles.co.kr.

steps.description: Send a GET request to /api/inventory with valid parameters
Ensure the API responds with HTTP status 200
Validate the response JSON contains expected fields and data formats for inventory

title: Shop API Proxy /api/shop Search Response Validation
description: Verify that the shop proxy API endpoint returns valid and accurate tire product search data corresponding to search parameters.

steps.description: Send a GET request to /api/shop with usual search filter parameters
Confirm API responds with HTTP status 200
Validate response JSON data correctness and completeness of tire product information

title: Invalid Login Credentials Handling
description: Verify that login attempts with invalid credentials are rejected and proper error messages are shown.

steps.description: Navigate to login page
Enter invalid username and/or password
Click the login button
Verify login failure with appropriate error message is displayed

title: Quote Generation with No Tires Selected
description: Verify that attempting to generate a quote without selecting any tires prompts an appropriate error or warning.

steps.description: Navigate to quote generation page without adding any tires
Attempt to submit a quote request
Verify that the system prevents submission and displays an informative error message

title: Search API Handles Invalid Filter Parameters Gracefully
description: Verify the search API proxy returns errors or empty results as appropriate without crashing when invalid or malformed filter parameters are sent.

steps.description: Send request to /api/shop with invalid filter parameters (e.g., malformed size, unknown brand)
Validate API returns a proper error response or an empty result set
Application UI handles the error gracefully without crashing and shows meaningful feedback

title: Membership Tier Changes Propagate Correctly on Login
description: Verify that when a user's membership tier is updated in the database, the changes are reflected correctly upon their next login.

steps.description: Update the membership tier for an existing user in the backend
Log out the user if logged in
Log back in using the user's credentials
Check that the new membership tier is correctly reflected in the user profile and UI elements

title: Store Mode Deactivation and Return to Normal User Mode
description: Verify store personnel can deactivate store mode and the system correctly reverts to normal user interface.

steps.description: Login as store personnel
Activate store mode
Deactivate store mode
Verify that store mode is fully disabled
Confirm normal user interface is restored and no consultation features are visible
